thread.title: Watch: Original Tamma Tamma girl Madhuri promotes Varun and Alia's version
thread.title_full: Watch: Original Tamma Tamma girl Madhuri promotes Varun and Alia's version

author: DECCAN CHRONICLE.
title: Watch: Original Tamma Tamma girl Madhuri promotes Varun and Alia's version
text:
Screengrabs from the video. Mumbai: Madhuri Dixit and Sanjay Dutt have made an entire generation dance to their tunes, with the supremely successful Tamma Tamma, from the 1990 flick, 'Thanedar'.
And now, over 16 years later, the song is back to make the nation groove to it, in Shashank Khaitan's 'Badrinath Ki Dulhania'.
The film, which features Varun Dhawan and Alia Bhatt in the lead roles, will have the duo dancing to it in their own inimitable styles.
However, the two had some excellent support coming for the song, from none other than Madhuri Dixit!
The veteran actress met the two and announced that the song will release in two days!
The film set in a small-town is earthy with its rustic charm and the chemistry between the two is as palpable as ever.
Produced by their mentor Karan Johar's Dharma Productions, 'Badrinath Ki Dulhania' arrives in the theatres on March 10.
Watch the video here:
